description: This file defines a themed style for a Flutter application, specifically creating a custom ThemeData object for the 'Cosmic Energy' theme. It specifies colors, widget styles, and component themes used throughout the app.

classes.name: ThemeData
classes.description: The main theme configuration object used to style the Flutter app.

classes.name: ColorScheme
classes.description: Defines the color scheme for the application.

classes.name: ElevatedButtonThemeData
classes.description: Configures the style for ElevatedButton widgets.

classes.name: AppBarTheme
classes.description: Configures the style for AppBar widgets.

classes.name: CardTheme
classes.description: Configures the style for Card widgets.

classes.name: TextTheme
classes.description: Defines various text styles used in the app.

methods.name: buildCosmicEnergyTheme
methods.description: Constructs and returns a ThemeData object customized for the Cosmic Energy theme.
